title: Implement the Budget Model and Repository
description: Create the Budget domain model and repository following the patterns shown.
instructions:
1. Create a Budget dataclass with id, category_id, user_id, amount_limit, period, start_date, end_date
2. Create a BudgetPeriod StrEnum with WEEKLY, MONTHLY, YEARLY values
3. Implement BudgetRepository with get_active_budgets() and check_budget_status() methods
4. Include validation in __post_init__
